turns.content: Which country albums have received the most awards and nominations from industry professionals?

There are several country albums that have received numerous awards and nominations from industry professionals, but the following are some of the most notable ones:

1. "Golden Hour" by Kacey Musgraves - This album has won several awards, including the Grammy Award for Album of the Year in 2019. It also won the Country Music Association Award for Album of the Year and the Academy of Country Music Award for Album of the Year in 2018.

2. "The Weight of These Wings" by Miranda Lambert - This album has been nominated for numerous awards, including the Grammy Award for Best Country Album in 2018. It won the Academy of Country Music Award for Album of the Year and the Country Music Association Award for Album of the Year in 2017.

3. "Traveller" by Chris Stapleton - This album has won several awards, including the Grammy Award for Best Country Album in 2016. It also won the Academy of Country Music Award for Album of the Year and the Country Music Association Award for Album of the Year in 2015.

4. "Same Trailer Different Park" by Kacey Musgraves - This album won the Grammy Award for Best Country Album in 2014. It also won the Academy of Country Music Award for Album of the Year and the Country Music Association Award for Album of the Year in 2013.

5. "Fearless" by Taylor Swift - This album won the Grammy Award for Best Country Album in 2010. It also won the Academy of Country Music Award for Album of the Year and the Country Music Association Award for Album of the Year in 2009.
